bug.author: chetanoruganti
bug.summary: notebookserver creation fails if the user passes extra space with custom image name . should this be handled in backend code
bug.description: /kind question area/jupyter while creating notebook server from the ui if the user selects custom image and passes custom image . if there is any tailing space in the image name the notebook server creation fails with imagepull error . Is it good to handle it in the backend .
